Articles.Content:
Hi! I recently setup a site dedicated to tracking devs for a multitude of games, and one of those games is KSP! It supports aggregated dev news from any source assuming I know to add it. Right now the KSP dashboard is following the main Twitter page, the KSPTV Twitter page, KSP Dev MaxMaps Twitter page, KSP Steam news, KSP Tumblr blog, and the news blog on the main site. I'm working on following the devs in the main forum. Am I missing any sources? Are there devs posting anywhere I don't know about? Any feedback would be great. Thanks!

[http://www.devtrackers.com/kerbal-space-program](http://www.devtrackers.com/kerbal-space-program)

Edit: I'm realizing the foundation I've made just isn't going to cut it. It doesn't have enough flexibility, and as a result the dev trackers aren't nearly as organized as I'd like. I need to rebuild about half of it. I have it tentatively planned out, but it will be time consuming. In the mean time I'll do what I can to make the current site adequate for the people interested, and failover to a new website here in the coming month. Thank you!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-27T00:30:01Z" title="03/27/2015 12:30  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 27, 2015</time> by devtrackers**
  
Clarification

Some of the people you've linked in your sources aren't devs afaik. Pretty sure MrChumley, Johnsonwax, and John FX aren't devs, and you should add HarvesteR, Mu, Ted, Samsonart, etc. The devnotes on Tumblr each Tuesday give the full list.

> 
> Some of the people you've linked in your sources aren't devs afaik. Pretty sure MrChumley, Johnsonwax, and John FX aren't devs, and you should add HarvesteR, Mu, Ted, Samsonart, etc. The devnotes on Tumblr each Tuesday give the full list.

Cool, appreciate the clarification. I'll work on updating it within the hour. Thanks!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-26T18:26:07Z" title="03/26/2015 06:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 26, 2015</time> by devtrackers**
